channel.title: Duy Tran — Lead Gameplay Engineer
channel.description: Recent content on Duy Tran — Lead Gameplay Engineer

item.title: Huli: Nine Tails of Vengeance — Technical Deep Dive
item.description:
Role: Lead Gameplay Engineer  |  Engine: Unreal Engine 5.7  |  Platforms: PC, PS5, Xbox Series X

Huli: Nine Tails of Vengeance is a combat-driven Action RPG featuring deep melee combat, AI-coordinated enemy encounters, and a modular plugin architecture built for scalability. This page walks through the core technical systems I designed and implemented.

Architecture Overview

The project is built on a three-tier modular plugin architecture that enforces clean dependency boundaries and supports independent iteration across teams.

item.title: UE5 C++ Best Practices for Gameplay Programming
item.description:
After years of working with Unreal Engine, I’ve compiled a list of best practices that have significantly improved code quality and team productivity.

1. Use Forward Declarations Aggressively

Minimize header dependencies by forward-declaring classes instead of including headers:

// Bad - creates dependency chain
#include "Character/LQPlayerCharacter.h"
#include "Abilities/LQGameplayAbility.h"

// Good - minimal dependencies
class ALQPlayerCharacter;
class ULQGameplayAbility;

This reduces compile times and prevents circular dependencies.

2. Prefer Interfaces for Cross-System Communication

Instead of casting to concrete types, define interfaces:

item.title: Register Race
item.description:
Overview

Register Race is a 3D casual mobile game where players take on the role of a cashier racing against AI opponents. The game combines fast-paced racing mechanics with a fun cashier register mini-game — type the correct price to speed ahead of the competition.

Platform: iOS / Android Engine: Unity Language: C# Genre: Hyper-casual / Racing

View on App Store

Key Features

  • Cashier racing mechanic — type prices correctly to accelerate
  • 3D environments with multiple themed tracks
  • AI opponents with difficulty scaling
  • Leaderboard and competitive ranking system

item.title: Assorted Detective
item.description:
Overview

Assorted Detective is a 2D hidden-object puzzle game that will challenge your brain. Players must find the requested items across increasingly complex and cluttered scenes.

Platform: iOS / Android Engine: Unity Language: C# Genre: Puzzle / Hidden Object

View on App Store

Key Features

  • Hidden object gameplay with hundreds of items to find
  • Increasingly complex scenes with layered difficulty
  • Timed challenges for competitive players
  • Hint system for when you’re truly stuck

item.title: 2048 Park
item.description:
Overview

2048 Park is a collection of 2048 puzzle game variants, offering multiple game modes and fresh takes on the classic 2048 formula. Players slide numbered tiles to combine them and reach higher values.

Platform: iOS / Android Engine: Unity Language: C# Genre: Puzzle / Casual

View on App Store

Key Features

  • Multiple 2048 variants in a single app
  • Progression system unlocking new game modes
  • Clean UI with smooth tile animations
  • Score tracking and personal bests

item.title: Clay Art
item.description:
Overview

Clay Art is an ASMR-style mobile game where players arrange colored parts onto a clay cube and enjoy the satisfying feeling of slicing through them. The game focuses on tactile, relaxing gameplay.

Platform: iOS / Android Engine: Unity Language: C# Genre: ASMR / Casual

Key Features

  • Satisfying ASMR cutting mechanics with haptic feedback
  • Colorful clay arrangements with creative patterns
  • Relaxing gameplay loop designed for stress relief
  • Multiple tools and cutting styles

item.title: Climber
item.description:
Overview

Climber is an in-house climbing wall simulation 3D game. Players attempt to reach the finish goal without being dropped, navigating increasingly challenging wall layouts with physics-based climbing controls.

Platform: Android Engine: Unity Language: C# Genre: Simulation / Casual

View on Google Play

Key Features

  • Physics-based climbing with realistic hand/grip mechanics
  • Procedural wall layouts with varying difficulty
  • 3D environments with multiple climbing venues
  • Achievement system tracking best climbs

item.title: Assassin
item.description:
Overview

Assassin is a 3D puzzle game where players must eliminate enemies and save allies using limited bullets. Each level requires careful planning and strategic thinking to complete the objective.

Platform: iOS / Android Engine: Unity Language: C# Genre: Puzzle / Strategy

View on App Store

Key Features

  • Limited bullet mechanic requiring strategic shot placement
  • Enemy and ally identification — avoid friendly fire
  • Physics-based projectiles with ricochet mechanics
  • Escalating difficulty across dozens of levels

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Lead Gameplay Engineer on Huli: Nine Tails of Vengeance — an action RPG built on Unreal Engine 5.7 targeting PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X. I architect and implement core combat systems, AI frameworks, and plugin infrastructure for a combat-driven gameplay experience.

Previously shipped 6 mobile titles (iOS/Android) as a Unity/C# developer, covering hyper-casual, puzzle, and simulation genres with App Store and Google Play releases.

Technical Focus

  • Combat Architecture: Custom GAS implementation with 7-stage damage pipeline, direction-aware parry, and visual combo editor
  • AI Frameworks: Hybrid State Tree + Behavior Tree system supporting 50+ concurrent entities at locked 60 FPS
  • Plugin Infrastructure: 19+ custom plugins following a strict three-tier dependency architecture
  • Performance Engineering: Console-grade optimization with async loading, AI LOD, and time-sliced coordination

Skills

  • Unreal Engine 5.7 — Custom engine modifications, Live Coding workflows, and cross-platform shipping (PC/PS5/Xbox Series X)
  • C++ — Performance-critical gameplay code, template metaprogramming, and async patterns
  • Gameplay Ability System — Custom ASC with ability data queueing, 7 attribute sets, and a 7-stage damage execution pipeline
  • AI Systems — Hybrid State Tree + Behavior Tree framework with coordinator patterns and formation management
  • Combat Architecture — Universal damage pipeline, direction-aware parry, visual combo graph editor
  • Plugin Development — 19+ custom plugins following a three-tier dependency architecture with editor tooling

Links

  • GitHub

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Huli: Nine Tails of Vengeance

Role: Lead Gameplay Engineer | Timeline: 2024 – Present

Action RPG built on Unreal Engine 5.7 targeting PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X. Led development of combat architecture (GAS, 7-stage damage pipeline, direction-aware parry), hybrid AI framework (50+ concurrent entities at 60 FPS), and 19+ custom plugins powering a modular, scalable gameplay foundation.
